mapper.select: SELECT dno,department.department,business,employee.name as manager,performance FROM department left join employee on department.mid = employee.id
SELECT dno,department.department,business,employee.name as manager,performance FROM department left join employee on department.mid = employee.id WHERE department.dno = #{dno}

SELECT dno,department.department,business,employee.name as manager,performance FROM department left join employee on department.mid = employee.id WHERE 1=1
AND (department.department like concat('%',#{department},'%'))

SELECT dno,department.department,business,employee.name as manager,performance FROM department left join employee on department.mid = employee.id WHERE 1=1
AND (department.business like concat('%',#{business},'%'))

SELECT jno,job.dno,description,job FROM department,job WHERE department.dno = job.dno
AND department.dno = #{dno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department (dno, department, business,mid,performance) VALUES (#{dno}, #{department}, #{business},#{mid},#{performance})
